Ῥoύθ, ἡ indecl. (Heb. רוּת),
Ruth: Mat.15:1-39.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman of the Moabites living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Rut.1.4; married to Mahlon (H4248) and Boaz (H1162);
mother of: Obed (H5744)
§ Ruth, "friendship," possibly "comrade, companion; refreshed"
Ruth, (Proper name), indeclinable, Mt. 1:5*
